name: Label Meeting - Album Release Planning
content: Maya meeting with label representative Jessica to discuss album progress and release strategy. Album update: 7 songs fully recorded and mixed, 3 in progress, on track for April release with February recording completion and March mastering. Addressed production concerns by incorporating analog gear and preserving authentic imperfections. Marketing discussion: planning acoustic social media sessions filmed in various city locations, sharing song inspiration stories for personal connection. Tour planning: proposed intimate 10-15 city club tour for June to build post-release momentum. Jessica supportive of all initiatives, scheduling follow-up with marketing team.
summary: Label meeting: album on track for April, planning acoustic social content, June intimate tour, maintaining authentic sound
